definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pl. [[הַפּׂרְטִים עַל־פִּי הַנׇּ֑בֶל]] Am 6:5 (NH break off, divide, so Syr. praht.; NH [[פְּרוּטָה]], Aram. [[פְּרִיטָא]], small coin, change, hence) A W Ra AEKi divide words into parts (in singing), AV chant; and Thes scatter (cf. [[פֶּרֶט]]) empty words; poss. also would be stammer (of broken speech; said contemptuously):—(Ar. farat.a is precede, act hastily, IV. act extravagantly, talk immoderately (v. further Dr:Am 236), hence) AW (as altern.) improvise carelessly, idly.
